author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...KAREN CONTINUES NORTHEASTWARD WITH NO CHANGE IN STRENGTH...
summary: ...KAREN CONTINUES NORTHEASTWARD WITH NO CHANGE IN STRENGTH... As of 3:00 PM GMT Fri Oct 10 the center of Karen was located near 46.3, -31.2 with movement NE at 13 mph. The minimum central pressure was 998 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 45 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...KAREN CONTINUES NORTHEASTWARD WITH NO CHANGE IN STRENGTH... As of 3:00 PM GMT Fri Oct 10 the center of Karen was located near 46.3, -31.2 with movement NE at 13 mph. The minimum central pressure was 998 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 45 mph.

title: Summary - Subtropical Storm Karen (AT1/AL112025)
